What is the Verus Fee Pool and Rewards system, and how does it work?

The Verus Fee Pool and Rewards system is a unique technology that goes live with PBaaS. When users perform transactions, such as cross-chain operations, DeFi activities, or ID registrations, the fees are collected in an on-chain "fee pool". Miners or stakers then take 1/100th of the pool in addition to the block reward. This incentive structure ensures that validators prioritize transactions based on fees, while preventing them from manipulating the fee system for personal gain.

6) **The Verus Fee Pool and Rewards**: Another technology and solution unique to Verus, the Verus Fee Pool technology goes live with PBaaS. What this means is that as people use the cross-chain, DeFi, or purchase/register IDs on the network, the miner or staker will put all fees into the on-chain “fee pool”, and then take 1/100th of the pool in addition to the block reward.
